means: 反对，表示异议（与 to 或 against连用）

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些前置词或短语均含"除……之外"之意。
means: besides ： 着重于指另外还有。
but ： 侧重指不包括在内。
except ： 侧重于排除在外，从整体里减去。可与but换用，但语气较强。
except for ： 多用于在说明基本情况或对主要部分加以肯定，还引出相反的原因或细节，从而部分地修正前面的主要意思，含惋惜意味。

sentence.Network_en: He hadn't eaten a thing except for one forkful of salad.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了一餐叉色拉，他什么都没吃。

sentence.Network_en: She sipped the wine. Everything was hazy now, except for Nick's face.
sentence.Network_cn: 她小口地抿着酒。现在一切都变得模糊起来，除了尼克的脸。

sentence.Network_en: Except for the remarkably tidy kitchen, the place was a mess.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了厨房特别干净外，这地方一片狼藉。

例外（Exception） 错误被称为例外(Exception)，而例外也是对象；它和Err 对象不一样，不同的例外被做成不同的对象。例如将非数 …

英语词汇的奥秘 ... educational 教育的 exceptional 例外的 refusal 拒绝.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... exception 例外 exceptional 异常的 excess 过量.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin except- 'taken out', from the verb excipere, from ex- 'out of' + capere 'take'

entry.def: You use except to introduce the only thing or person that a statement does not apply to, or a fact that prevents a statement from being completely true.

example.ex: I wouldn't have accepted anything except a job in Europe...
example.tran: 除了到欧洲工作外，我本来什么都不会接受。

example.ex: I don't take any drugs whatsoever, except aspirin for colds...
example.tran: 我什么药都不吃，除了感冒时吃阿司匹林。

entry.def: You use except for to introduce the only thing or person that prevents a statement from being completely true.

example.ex: He hadn't eaten a thing except for one forkful of salad...
example.tran: 除了一餐叉色拉，他什么都没吃。

example.ex: Everyone was late, except for Richard.
example.tran: 除了理查德，其他所有人都迟到了。

sentences.sentence: "he demurred at my suggestion to work on Saturday"

means.word_mean: 2. prevent from being included or considered or accepted;

sentences.sentence: "The bad results were excluded from the report"

auth_sentence.content: Except for the band members themselves, of course.
auth_sentence.res_content: Except for the band members themselves, of course.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Except for the band members themselves, of course.

auth_sentence.content: The gates will be closed except on open days.
auth_sentence.res_content: The gates will be closed except on open days.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The gates will be closed except on open days.

auth_sentence.content: Except it's even more throwaway than standard Chromeo.
auth_sentence.res_content: Except it's even more throwaway than standard Chromeo.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Except it's even more throwaway than standard Chromeo.

stems_affixes.word_buile: de坏+cept拿,抓,握住+ive……的→拿坏的东西来→欺骗性的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易受感染的,易受影响的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sus下+cept拿+ible能……的→能被[病]拿下→易受影响
con共同+cept拿,抓,握住→共同把握→共同的想法→观念,概念
in进入+cept拿,抓,握住+ion动作或状态→开始拿住→开端
per全部+cept拿,抓,握住+ion状态→全部抓住→理解;感知
pre预先+cept拿,抓,握住→预先拿好的话→箴言
re再+ceipt=cept抓→再次拿到→得到的收据
re再+cept拿,抓,握住+acle东西→拿东西的东西→容器
ac再+cept拿,抓,握住→一再拿→接受

Sentence.sentence: The talks can be held any day except this Friday.
The town has been browsed bare of vegetation except where gardens and shrubs are protected by high fences.
The levers and light were set up in exactly the same way except that this time it was only Doris who could see the light indicating which lever to press first.
There was nothing left except some pie

means.word_mean: 略去，删去；不计；把…作为例外；把…除外，不包括…在内；免除

sentences.en: When I say that the boys are lazy, I except you.
sentences.cn: 我说男孩懒惰, 并不包括你。

sentences.en: You will be punished, I can except no one.
sentences.cn: 你们都得受到惩罚, 我不放过任何人。

sentences.en: Everybody except me looks down upon him.
sentences.cn: 除了我以外人们都瞧不起他。

sentences.en: I didn't see him, except casually, in two months.
sentences.cn: 我两个月里我只偶尔见过他。

sentences.en: I like her except when she is angry.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢她, 只要她不发脾气。

sentences.en: He could do little except write.
sentences.cn: 他除了会写之外, 其他什么都不行。

sentences.en: I know nothing about him except that he lives next door.
sentences.cn: 我对他一无所知, 只知道他住在隔壁。

sentences.en: I received nothing except what was due to me.
sentences.cn: 除了我应得的东西, 我并未接受任何东西。

means.word_mean: [口语]要不是；但是；除了[后跟副词、短语或从句]

sentences.en: I'd quit except I need the money.
sentences.cn: 要不是我需要钱的话，我就辞职了。

sentences.en: parallel cases,except that one is younger than the other
sentences.cn: 情况类似，只是一个比另一个年轻一些

means.word_mean: 反对，表示异议(与 to 或 against连用)

jushi.english: I know nothing about him except that he lives next door.
jushi.chinese: 我对他一无所知,只知道他住在隔壁。

jushi.english: He could do little except write.
jushi.chinese: 他除了会写之外,其他什么都不行。

jushi.english: She couldn't get any other job except waiting at table.
jushi.chinese: 除了当侍者,她找不到任何工作。
